website_summaries.verdict: A small walk-in green house with large roll-up doors at each end to provide ample access.
pros: The powder-coated steel tubing provides a durable framework for the unit's cover
This model features 4 sizable roll-up windows with screens so you can better control the heat and light that enters your greenhouse
It also includes 12 ground stakes to help secure the structure
cons: The covering is not quite as durable as the frame and may need to be replaced or upgraded after a season or two

customer_reviews.title: Nice greenhouse for the price
customer_reviews.text: The greenhouse has been great since I set it up late in the summer. The frame feels sturdy and the canvas did fine with about 3-4 inches of snow on it. Not sure if it would handle much more snow, or a lot of wind, at least not without some reinforcement. But it stays a few degrees warmer during the winter nights and heats up fast in the morning. This thing is a great deal for a small greenhouse.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: This greenhouse is perfect for the family garden or avid grower
customer_reviews.text: This greenhouse is perfect for the family garden or avid grower. It must be anchored with additional supplies to sustain even a light wind. The fabric is well made.....if you are handy then you will know how to reinforce
customer_reviews.author: Maryb

customer_reviews.title: Magnificent buy
customer_reviews.text: I STRONGLY recommend this greenhouse. It is wonderful, and durable. I do recommend getting extra ground hooks. I Love it
customer_reviews.author: Mavi Figueres

customer_reviews.title: great addition to our garden.
customer_reviews.text: went up fine, with minimal issues. The screws they provided are cheap, and one broke, but not a big deal. I really like it, fits 4 small cannabis plants perfectly. I was able to start all my tomatoes, basil. herbs and peppers ahead of schedule and they are already blooming. yay. Im very happy with this addidtion to our yard. I bought some heater wire (for greenhouses and hotboxes)) and attached it to hardcloth (wire) and cover w. dirt and it becomes a heated greenhosue in winter w. a small fan. I wold definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: fatcat

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Just wished it was Waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Just wished it was Waterproof! The Seams Leak but Sprayed some Flex Seal on them and It's been Great to be in on Rainy Days
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a great product! My only complaint is that the instructions could have been so much clearer.
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality. Ridiculously sturdy and well made for the price. It would have been so easy to set up, if the instructions had said something like: “All #2s fit together with #5s (making up the numbers now). The #3s make up the A-frame, one goes in front. The other at the other end.” As it is, there aren’t any written instructions. Only a small diagram full of numbers. Super stupid. It was still simple to put together, but it took twice as long because I didn’t know where to start.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this and was very disappointed. The fabric did not last even one year. In less than a year the fabric became brittle and fell apart in the hot Florida sun. I strongly suggest you do not waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: 50PlusBooksaYear

customer_reviews.title: Great Design for a Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic greenhouse! Purchased this for my 10 year old son and I as we both were inspired by the movie titled 'The Martian' starring Matt Damon. If he could grow a successful crop on M A R S then surely we could do so here on Planet Earth. Sturdy, Modern, Quick Assembly, withstood the 6 hours of hurricane force winds and constant rain last week here in Texas. The mesh windows let air through while deterring pests and birds and also helps to regulate the temperature inside. March 28th was our seed planting day and everything is going well so far, these photos were captured today. Buy the greenhouse. You'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: bianka walker

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected!
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice size greenhouse, perfect for our small yard. The steel frame is fairly sturdy but we added several more anchors and really staked it down well. So far it's held up to some 50 mph wind gusts with no issues. We will see how well is does through a windy summer along the lake.
customer_reviews.author: Julie V Y

customer_reviews.title: The jury is still out.
customer_reviews.text: Well the 4 stars are for customer service. After having it up 2 days and it rained, it leaked. BAD! But, i contacted customer service and they responded quickly & they are sending me a new one. I like the height, the big windows, and the thickness of the cover. If the new one doesnt leak then they get 5 stars. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this, the material is worse then cardboard!
customer_reviews.text: After buying this White House, I am disappointed with the quality of the material already separating at the seams. What a piece of junk!! Save yourself the mental anguish and buy something better.
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Van Riper

customer_reviews.title: This has been an excellent product for my use as a paint shed
customer_reviews.text: Use as a paint shed. The 4 windows keep the bugs out while they provide the necessary air flow and the zip up door allows access without introducing dust etc. Plenty sturdy
customer_reviews.author: J. Mageean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Its very study frame. Covering is thick. It well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, but leaks at seams.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy product, easy to assemble. Leaks at roof seams, despite using spray on sealer.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie MacAdams Mele

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper version
customer_reviews.text: The cover is not as good as other listings with a similar-appearing greenhouse or the replacement cover offered on Amazon in the same dimensions. The cover that comes with this listing is thinner and has thinner zippers. However, at the time of purchase, this listing was $100 cheaper than the better alternative.
customer_reviews.author: Dragonberry

customer_reviews.title: Shop around. You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I know i'm in the desert in the southern California heat however I barely got it in April and it being mid July is already showing deterioration. The frame I will admit is definitely sturdy and it helps to anchor it down well if wind is an issue. However I am not impressed by the way the liner is holding up.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Only needed a replacement cover.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price. Wish they sold covers. That's really all I needed, now I have a box of parts I don't need. Seems like an awefull waste.
customer_reviews.author: Leland C Noll

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy 2 person assembly. Nice for extra storage. Great for plant starter in late winter and early spring.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wetter

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with this greenhouse. Dont have the time for a full review but happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: France Horizon

customer_reviews.title: Lasted One Summer
customer_reviews.text: I loved it until the zippier started to come apart. Long story short it lasted one summer. I have not been able to find a replacement cover. It doesn’t last, the frame is great, the cover is flawed
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: So easy to assemble and seems pretty strong so far
customer_reviews.text: I put it together myself in less than an hour. It was SO much easier than my Shed-In-A-Box. Only issue is that there is apparently no replacement cover available so once it tears or whatever, you're on your own and I don't see any other covers that match this size. I confirmed this with the manufacturer. I'm thinking maybe I could put some corregated sheets up instead but that's pretty costly.
customer_reviews.author: ErikI

product_meta.title: Outsunny Walk-in Garden Greenhouse Fully Enclosed with Extra Thick Steel Tubing, 4 Windows (Plus Screens), and 2 Zippered Doors for a Perfect Garden Haven, 6' L x 8' W x 7' H, White
feature_bullets: ✅PROTECT PLANTS FROM THE ELEMENTS: Bring all of your plants together in a unified and protected space that helps you manage and grow your plants, fruits, vegetables, and flowers all year round.

✅LET THE GOOD STUFF IN: The greenhouse features with a transparent PE cover to protect plants while allowing nourishing sunlight to pass through. The side is reinforced with grey polyster fabric for added aesthetics and durability.

✅DESIGNED FOR LONGEVITY: Create a stable, reliable structure that' built for years of gardening thanks to the extra thick 1.33" round powder coated steel tubing resists chipping, peeling, and with big foot plates and 12 ground stakes.

✅CONTROL THE EXPOSURE: 4 roll-up windows with screens help to control the amount of heat and light that enters the greenhouse and your gardening experience. Enter and exit easily via the 2 zippered doors.
✅YOUR OWN PRIVATE RETREAT: The large tunnel-design greenhouse makes it easy for people to walk inside, stay comfortable and conveniently care for and manage a large number of plants.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
